#summary Explains how output is handled

= Output and Response =
Once the noad has been loaded, it handles the do action. If, at this point, the node wants to return a response, it asks Output to create a response of the wanted type (usually HTML).

Output is the main class that handles with output and caching.

Response is the object created (instance) of the answer sent to browser.

= Caching =
Caching is done with parts the template asked for.
